resources.string: The chief executive officer (CEO) is responsible as a leader to regulate and direct the sustainability of the company.
Dentists with labels specializing in prosthodontics, orthodontics, and oral surgery, are considered to have special expertise in treating patients with dental problems.
Surgeons who are specialists are also included in the category of high income because their duties are more complex in dealing with disease cases.
Airline pilots whose job it is to operate aircraft safely and professionally.
Lawyers or advocates are professions that offer legal services, especially for purposes that require expert legal counsel in handling civil cases.
Sales managers can be placed in various companies with roles as supervisors of the sales team, budget analysis, to provide benefits for the business.

Teachers is one of the noble professions. The teachers job is to teach various things to students. Teaching that is done really requires knowledge and expertise. Including part of Teachers contribution to educate the nation.

The president is the highest profession in a modern country. The basic salary of the president is quite large and prestigious. The president is actually just a designation, the point is the head of state.
The duty of a soldier is to defend the nation and state to the last drop of blood. Especially for those assigned to the border or the battlefield. There are many risks faced by a soldier.

A programmer is someone who is in charge of creating a system, application, or program using a programming language. This language consists of a collection of syntaxes that can bridge the human mind and also the computer
